scenario.name: VS3000 origination
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field0]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] From: "[field1]"<sip:[field2]@[local_ip];user=phone>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 20 INVITE Contact: <sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 66 User-Agent: VS4000/SIP Ver1.0.0 Subject: VS4000 PBX Expires: 120 Allow: INVITE, ACK, UPDATE, INFO, CANCEL, BYE, PRACK, OPTIONS, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, MESSAGE Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=VS3000 0 0 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=SIP CALL c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 18 101 a=sendrecv a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=ptime:20

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch-5] [routes] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: 20 ACK Contact: <sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 5 User-Agent: VS4000/SIP Ver1.0.0 Content-Length: 0

BYE [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch-1] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [routes] Contact: <sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> CSeq: 803 BYE Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: ATA Content-Length: 0
